amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to prohibit the use of evidence obtained by or with the assistance of a member of the Armed Forces in violation of the Posse Comitatus Act in a court or other legal proceeding.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A013) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Schiff.
